title: Correction: Brain-Computer Interface-Based Communication in the Completely Locked-In State
fullText:
The URL where data for Patient F can be found is missing from the captions of Fig 1, Fig 2, S4 Table, S5 Table, and S2 Fig in the original article. The URL where the data can be found is: https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.1419151. Please see the complete captions for Fig 1, Fig 2, S4 Table, S5 Table, and S2 Fig below, along with their accompanying figure and supporting information files.
